author: USA TODAY, Joseph Allen and Marc Lipsitch, Opinion contributors
title: 6 things to know if you're living with someone who has coronavirus, or think you might be
description: The odds are this will happen to many of us. But we know how to minimize risk for you, your family, roommates and anyone coming through your door.
content:
This is not hyperbole. The estimates vary, but up to 60% of people will contract SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, in the next year. 
With mass social distancing in force to help slow the speed at which coronavirus courses through the United States… [+5818 chars]
